source.3882b271:
figure = plt.figure(figsize=(10,10))
axis_func = plt.axes(projection=ccrs.SouthPolarStereo())
axis_func.set_global()
axis_func.add_feature(cartopy.feature.LAND, edgecolor='black')
axis_func.add_feature(cartopy.feature.BORDERS, linestyle='-', alpha=1)
axis_func.add_feature(cartopy.feature.OCEAN,facecolor=("blue"))
axis_func.coastlines(resolution="110m",linewidth=3)
axis_func.gridlines(linestyle='--',color='green',linewidth=2)

axis_func.set_extent([-180, 180, -90, -60], ccrs.PlateCarree())

plt.contourf(Lon_Gen, Lat_Gen, Melt_99, transform=ccrs.PlateCarree(),cmap="hot")

color_bar_func = plt.colorbar(ax=axis_func, orientation="vertical", pad=0.05, aspect=16, shrink=0.5).set_label("UNIT DENS",size=15,weight='bold')
#color_bar_func.ax.tick_params(labelsize=7)

plt.title(Reading_78.variables["melt"].long_name)
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

source.d8455215:
def displaying_map(source):
    
    figure = plt.figure(figsize=(10,10))

    Image_List = []
    plt.style.use("dark_background")
    for indexing in source:
        
        Read_IMG = plt.imshow(indexing, animated=True,cmap="hot")
        plt.axis('off')
        Image_List.append([Read_IMG])

    Animation_Func = animation.ArtistAnimation(figure, Image_List, interval=120, repeat_delay=9000)
    
    plt.close()
    
    return Animation_Func
source.b9d808cb:
def saving_map(data_set,list_set=list):
    for x_range in range(len(data_set.variables["melt"][:,0,0])):
        figure = plt.figure(figsize=(10,10))
        axis_func = plt.axes(projection=ccrs.SouthPolarStereo())
        axis_func.set_global()
        axis_func.coastlines(resolution="110m",linewidth=2)
        axis_func.gridlines(linestyle='--',color='green',linewidth=2)

        axis_func.set_extent([-180, 180, -90, -60], ccrs.PlateCarree())

        plt.contourf(Lon_Gen, Lat_Gen, data_set.variables["melt"][int(x_range),:,:], transform=ccrs.PlateCarree(),cmap="hot")
        plt.savefig(f"t10m_{x_range}.jpg")
        plt.close(figure)
        NEW_READING_IMG = cv2.cvtColor(cv2.imread(f"t10m_{x_range}.jpg"),cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB)
        list_set.append(NEW_READING_IMG)
source.9fc1b917:
def show_map(data_set):
    figure = plt.figure(figsize=(10,10))
    axis_func = plt.axes(projection=ccrs.SouthPolarStereo())
    axis_func.set_global()
    axis_func.coastlines(resolution="110m",linewidth=2)
    axis_func.gridlines(linestyle='--',color='green',linewidth=2)

    axis_func.set_extent([-180, 180, -90, -60], ccrs.PlateCarree())

    plt.contourf(Lon_Gen, Lat_Gen, data_set.variables["melt"][0,:,:], transform=ccrs.PlateCarree(),cmap="hot")
    plt.title(data_set.variables["melt"].long_name)
    plt.tight_layout()
    plt.show()
source.feff8848:
for x_c in range(8):
    Url_Get_All = f"../input/antarctica-several-data-multi-task-i/ANTARCTICA_SET_I/antarctica_melt_1978_2016/melt_{1978+(x_c*4)}.nc"
    Reading_Set_All = Dataset(Url_Get_All)
    locals()[f"List_{1978+(x_c*4)}"] = []
    saving_map(Reading_Set_All,locals()[f"List_{1978+(x_c*4)}"])
    print(f"YEAR - {1978+(x_c*4)}")
    show_map(Reading_Set_All)
    print("\n")
